name: Map Selection
summary: Demonstrates the function to switch to different type of maps

name: Projection Selection
summary: Demonstrates the function to switch to map projections

name: WRAP Basic Function Test
summary: Test of WRAP's Basic Function(Feature、coordinate、Tooltip)

name: GPV(GSM)
summary: Displays the GSM numerical model on the map

name: GPV(UKMET)
summary: Displays the UKMET numerical model on the map

name: GPV(GFS)
summary: Displays the GFS numerical model on the map

name: GPV(MSM)
summary: Displays the MSM numerical model on the map

name: GPV(MSM-Ground)
summary: Displays the MSM-Ground numerical model on the map

name: COMPASS (Hour)
summary: Displays COMPASS weather forecast on a map

name: High Low Front
summary: Surface Pressure (High/Low) / Surface Analysis ( Front )

name: Wind Barbs (GrandMaster)
summary: Wind speed and direction displayed as barbs on a map

name: Sea Visibility
summary: Displays the sea visibility on a map

name: DaSH (Danger, Severe, Heavy)
summary: Danger, severe, heavy waves marked on a map

name: Surface Pressure (NOAA Ensemble)
summary: Surface pressure from NOAA Ensemble displayed on a map

name: Iceberg (MSC)
summary: Amount of iceberg displayed on a map

name: Sea Spray Icing
summary: Sea spray icing information displayed on a map

name: Wave Height and Direction
summary: Wave speed and direction displayed on a map. Low resolution and high resolution are combined in one map.

name: Ice Concentration (ISEE)
summary: Ice concentration displayed as a gradient on a map

name: METAR and TAF
summary: Displays weather information of airports on a map

name: Car-GPS
summary: Displays the locations of cars on a map

name: Live Camera
summary: Displays the live camera on a map

name: Lightning
summary: Displays the lightning information on a map

name: Radar
summary: Displays the radar on a map

name: RadarAmedas
summary: Displays the live AMeDAS on a map

name: Satellite
summary: Draws a satellite image on top of a map

name: SIGWX
summary: Displays the SIGWX AMeDAS on a map

name: SIGMET
summary: Displays SIGMET information on a map

name: Airports
summary: Displays airport locations on a map

name: VAA
summary: Displays VAA on a map

name: Fix
summary: Displays FIX on a map

name: FIR
summary: Displays the FIR on a map

name: Navaids
summary: Displays the Navaids on a map

name: LatLon
summary: Draws the lines of equal latitude and longitute

name: Tiled Map Data Sample
summary: Draws coastlines and borders (between countries, shi(JPN))

name: GASS Scale
summary: Displays the GASS Scale on a map

name: ASCScale
summary: Displays the ASCS Scale on a map

name: DisasterReport
summary: Displays the disaster information on a map

name: Current
summary: Displays the VP:Current on a map。

name: AMeDAS
summary: Displays AMeDAS (sunshine, temperature, percipitation, snowfall) on a map

name: ACOSforVA
summary: Displays ACOSforVA on a map

name: TropicalStorm
summary: Displays data of tropical storms of JMA, JTWC, and WNI on a map

name: JMA Warn
summary: Displays JAM Warning on a map

name: JMA SeaWarn
summary: Displays WX_JAM_SeaWarn on a map

name: WX_WNI_JP_10Ten_Report
summary: Displays 10 minute weather report (10-ten) from supporters on a map

name: WX_JMA_JP_GPV_HourlyAnalysis
summary: Displays the wind speed, wind direction, and temperature at a given height and hour

name: Grid
summary: Shows data by grid
